Two demos provided: 
1. static page driven demo (clf demo theme pages); and 
2. database driven page demo (cadms application).

The static demo (clf) provided has been generated by codeChargeStudio to 
run on LAMPP, but does not require MySQL.

The dynamic demo (cadms) provided has been generated by codeChargeStudio to
run on LAMPP, and requires MySQL on localhost by default.
